name: IDK The Game
description:
Listen up!

You must get to the GREEN ZONE

The opposite color kills you, red kills you no matter what

You can go though the same color as you

It is really unfair

Controls:

Arrow keys- use to move

Space- switch color

Q- go back to level select screen

ESC- quit game

PS: by pressing up and down keys rapidly, it will cancel out your horizontal movement.
